pr_title: update instructions as per the latest public repos

timeline.message:
update instructions as per the latest public repos

* update tags in docker readme
* update conda binary names and pip repo names

timeline.author: aaronmarkham
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,6 +57,12 @@ _macOS_
 1. Create an environment and install torchserve and torch-model-archiver
     ```bash
     conda create --name torchserve torchserve torch-model-archiver -c pytorch
+    conda install -c pytorch -c powerai pytorch torchtext torchvision
+    ```
+    For GPU
